known_issues: Current screen size appears too small; user requests medium size

existing_features.title: Increase the Snake Arena gameplay area from the current small appearance to a medium-sized layout by updating the responsive sizing rules for the main gameplay container (the element with classes `game-container snake-game-container`) so it uses more of the available viewport on typical desktop/tablet screens while still fitting fully within the viewport.

Ensure the canvas viewport measurement and rendering scale correctly after the gameplay container size changes (so the `SnakeCanvas` continues to receive accurate `viewportWidth/viewportHeight` values from `useCanvasViewport` and the rendered canvas is crisp and fills the container).

new_feature_requests.summary: Adjust the app/game screen size from small to a medium size for better viewing

projectName: Increase gameplay screen to medium size (Snake Arena)
